headline: Sandoz challenges Amgen’s Enbrel patents in US antitrust lawsuit

headline: Sandoz files U.S. antitrust lawsuit against Amgen over arthritis drug
summary: ZURICH (Reuters) -Swiss generic drug manufacturer Sandoz said on Monday it had filed an antitrust lawsuit in the United States against Amgen over the alleged entrenchment of the market position of its blockbuster medicine, Enbrel (etanercept).  Sandoz alleges Amgen blocked competition from more cost-effective biosimilar competitors, including Sandoz etanercept biosimilar, Erelzi, by unlawfully purchasing and using certain patent rights to entrench its dominant market position.  Amgen said it did not comment on pending litigation.
